review: I really love the fire stick!  I have a ROKU for my office TV but instead of buying another one for my bedroom I decided to buy the fire stick.  I was lucky enough to catch the fire stick on sale which was my first plus.  2nd this was SO easy to set up.  I love the options it has as well.  I have been able to watch Hulu Plus, Netflix and a bunch of other channels with it...no problems at all.

review: This has worked perfectly for me to stream Netflix and Hulu on my tv and not have to hook up my laptop to it.  Set-up was a breeze and didn't take very long for me because I already had my Netflix and Hulu accounts.  I am very happy with this purchase.  I was a little hesitant based on some of the reviews but so far so good with this product.
author: Jenny Gray

review: The stick is great for watching free stuff, such as old HBO series and some movies. Unfortunately, Amazon did not say that it requires a newer HDMI port. After 45 minutes on the phone with an exceptionally helpful Amazon tech, she determined that the stick was not supposed to work with my four year old TV b/c the HDMI ports were not new enough. The stick does work, however, it causes interference with regular channels - the options...send it back for a refund or keep it and only plug into the TV when we want to use it. We are keeping it.
author: JR

review: Installation was so quick and easy.  The first two movies everything worked perfectly.  Then the problems began.... Not real happy right now.
